user_stories.title: Track relay completion across all rounds
user_stories.description: Implement a relay tracker that monitors completion status of all rounds to achieve 100% relay completion rate
acceptance_criteria: Relay tracker records each round completion timestamp
Dashboard displays completion percentage in real-time
Alerts trigger when any round remains incomplete after timeout
All relay rounds are marked complete before handoff proceeds

user_stories.title: Generate actionable handoff document
user_stories.description: Create a structured handoff document that contains all necessary information for the next team to act immediately
acceptance_criteria: Handoff document includes context, current state, and next steps
Document is auto-populated from relay tracker data
Template includes assignable action items with owners
Handoff is validated for completeness before submission

user_stories.title: Prevent critical errors during relay process
user_stories.description: Implement validation and error handling to ensure zero critical errors during specialty handoff
acceptance_criteria: Input validation catches malformed specialty assignments
Critical errors are logged with full context
System halts and alerts on any critical error occurrence

user_stories.title: Assign specialties based on task requirements
user_stories.description: Implement logic to match team member specialties to task requirements for optimal routing
acceptance_criteria: Specialty mapping algorithm scores member-task fit
Manual override capability provided for edge cases
Assignment history is recorded for audit

technical_requirements: Relay state machine with explicit round transitions
Persistent storage for relay history and handoff documents
Error handling middleware with circuit breaker pattern
